chapter.title: Optional exercise: Implementing a tree to view the todos grouped by tags

section.title: Target of this exercise
section.para: In this exercise you create a part with displays a tree with the todo items structured by there tags.

section.title: Add dependencies
section.para: Ensure that org.eclipse.jface and org.eclipse.e4.ui.dialogs plug-in are available as dependency in the com.example.e4.rcp.todo plug-in. You might have added these dependencies already in another exercise.

section.title: Create part implementation
section.para: Create the following part implementation with the label or summary and description fields as tree columns. This part should also have a "Load Data" button to load the data into the viewer.
